text: waladhi ja' bialsidq fi qawlah waeamaluh min al'anbia' watbaehm, wsddaq bih 'iymanana wemla 'uwlayik hum aladhin jamaeuu khsal altqwa, wafi muqadimat hwla' khatm al'anbia' walmrslyn muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam walmuminun bh, aleamilun bshryeth min alshabt, radi allah enhm, fman baedihim 'iilaa yawm aldyn
